Title: Assistant Purchasing Manager
Description: Company Description|A luxury hospitality brand for modern travellers, Anantara connects guests to genuine places, people and stories through personal experiences and providing heartfelt hospitality in the world’s most exciting destinations. From pristine islands and tropical beaches to cosmopolitan cities, tranquil deserts and lush jungles, Anantara welcomes guests for journeys rich in discovery.|Job Description|Are you passionate about purchasing at the very top end of the market- Do you have an eye for detail and can-do attitude in getting the best deals- As Assistant Purchasing Manager you need to see yourself as an enthusiastic individual who can communicate easily with both your fellow team members and hotel suppliers. You will be responsible for establishing foreign/domestic supplier database and negotiating the lowest prices for the best quality. Establishing short and long term contracts to leverage on prices and administering online purchasing systems for acquiring materials will be also part of your important role.|Qualifications|College degree in Accounting or related field|Minimum 3 years experience in luxury hotel as Assistant Purchasing Manager|Excellent negotiation skills and knowledge in procurement administration|Capable to multi-task and manage a number of tasks simultaneously|Driving license as an added advantage|Good level of English, French and Arabic written and spoken|

Title: Senior SAP ABAP Developer
Description: |Location: Sousse, TN, 4061 | Participate in the definition of design samples and templates Implement test and authorization concepts according to the defined specifications Realize the development process with respect to specification and implementation (e.g. creation of test cases for the integration test etc.) Check the accordance of all implementation measures with the agreed application architecture and the regulations provided Create suitable implementation versions for programming requirements Ensure a consistent overall customization by cooperating with the application architects Revise, implement and coordinate technical aspects of the projects Create parts of the IT specifications Define technical implementation details in the framework of design specifications Instruct and consult developers/ customizers and ensure the knowledge transfer with respect to implementation issues and methods Bachelor / Master´s degree in IT At least 3 years of experience in the IT field Experience in development with ABAP(OO) Experience in development of SAP UI5 / SAP FIORI / SAP BTP and JavaScript is desirable Experience in form development (SAP Script, Smart Forms, Adobe Forms) Experience in enhancement options in SAP (BAdI, Enhancement, Customer Functions etc.) Experience in development of Interfaces (e.g. IDoc) Strong knowledge about SAP (Rapid Application Programming), Core Data Services or ODATA services Perfect communication in English is mandatory |We´re currently looking for an exceptional Senior ABAP developer to join our change makers in the IT Center. You will take part in our international projects by participating in the definition of the design of closely connected/ relevant (sub) applications/ modules in the area of SAP ABAP Development.|Embrace your future in an international team! |Your Tasks :|Your Profile:|Our Benefits:| Initial training. Career advancement opportunities.|Note: Please ensure that you provide us with English Cv, otherwise your application will not be taken into consideration|We are looking forward to your application. |Company / Legal Entity: DACT Draexlmaier Automotive Center Tunisia S.C.S. Title: Technical Support Engineer Senior
Description: Company Description|Jobs for Humanity is collaborating with FIS Global to build an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. We support individuals coming from all walks of life. | Company Name: FIS Global|Job Description| Position Type : |Full time| Type Of Hire : |Experienced (relevant combo of work and education)| Travel Percentage : |0%|We are FIS. Our technology powers the world’s economy and our teams bring innovation to life. We champion diversity to deliver the best products and solutions for our colleagues, clients and communities. If you’re ready to start learning, growing and making an impact with a career in fintech, we’d like to know: Are you FIS?|What you will be doing:|You will be part of one of our most important client-facing support teams, that serve our major client base in Europe, Middle East and Africa.|You will be responsible for finding solutions to our client’s functional and technical issues and for managing these issues through to resolution.|Acknowledge, qualify and treat clients’ concerns raised through the available communication channels (emails, phone, Ticketing system)|Troubleshooting and Debugging of FrontEnd to BackEnd applications using various technologies and tools|Coordinate inter-departmental resources and liaise closely with clients at all levels|Work alongside the Client Services Managers, Sales Account Managers and other DEV/Support teams|Gain an in-depth knowledge of the products and the detailed configurations to better serve our clients|What you bring:|Good technical diagnostic, analytic and problem-solving skills|Understanding of Client / Server Application model and API concept.|Linux, Shell scripting & Network understanding such as FTP, SSH, TCP/IP|High communication skills in English (Written and verbal) – Mandatory|Effective communication |and relationship-building skills.|The ability to work effectively within local and distributed teams|The ability to multi-task and work well under pressure, providing timely and accurate solutions to numerous clients’ needs|Shift work required including weekend and public holidays|Added bonus if you have:|Service management knowledge (ITIL v3/v4, PMP)|Capital Markets and Trading platforms experience|What we offer you:|At FIS, we are as committed to growing our employees’ careers as our own business. We offer:|An attractive salary package and other bonuses as performance bonus, meals vouchers, transportation….|Attractive range of benefits including private medical cover, dental cover, and travel insurance.|Continuous development through our diversified training across core financial, sales and FIS solutions.|A modern, international work environment and a dedicated and motivated, supportive team.|A broad range of professional development possibilities, resources and opportunities|Privacy Statement|FIS is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all personal information that we process in order to provide services to our clients. For specific information on how FIS protects personal information online, please see the Online Privacy Notice.|Sourcing Model|Recruitment at FIS works primarily on a direct sourcing model; a relatively small portion of our hiring is through recruitment agencies. FIS does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies which are not on the preferred supplier list and is not responsible for any related fees for resumes submitted to job postings, our employees, or any other part of our company.|#pridepass|

skills|Participate regularly in meeting and project status follow-up|Lead meeting when necessary: project status follow-up|Clear communication and alerts: Proactively highlight any risk or delay on a given delivery or ETA, push the team to find solutions and alert when necessary|What we offer :|An attractive salary package and other bonuses as performance bonus, meals vouchers, Title: Agent de réservations (H/F)
Description: |Description de l'entreprise|Pourquoi travailler chez Accor ?|Nous sommes bien plus qu’un leader mondial. Nous vous accueillons comme vous êtes et vous pouvez trouver le métier et la marque qui correspond à votre personnalité.|Nous vous accompagnons dans votre évolution et votre apprentissage au quotidien, nous nous assurons que votre travail apporte du sens à votre vie. Ainsi, durant votre expérience avec nous, vous pouvez explorer les possibilités illimitée du Groupe Accor.|En rejoignant Accor, vous écrivez chaque chapitre de votre histoire et ensemble nous pouvons imaginer l’Hôtellerie de demain. Découvrez la vie qui vous attend chez Accor, https://careers.accor.com/.|Faites ce que vous aimez, prenez soin du monde qui vous entoure, oser challenger le status quo ! #BELIMITLESS|Description du poste|Agent de réservations (H/F)|Vous êtes au commencement d'une expérience client exceptionnelle. En tant qu'Agent de réservations (H/F), vous représentez cette expérience dès l'accueil du client!|Ce que l'établissement vous offre :|En quelques mots, mettez en valeur les bénéfices et les avantages à travailler dans votre établissement|Carte collaborateurs offrant des taux réduits chez Accor|Plan de formations délivrées dans nos Académies|L’opportunité de développer vos talents et de vous épanouir au sein de votre établissement et à travers le monde|La capacité à faire la différence à travers nos activités Ethiques & Responsabilité Sociale des Entreprises, comme Planet 21|Votre rôle :|Proposer une offre de services exceptionnels et attrayants aux clients|Garantir la meilleure sélection pour le client et les meilleurs profits à travers l'offre de services|Recommander les équipements et services de l'établissement, et assister les clients et leurs requêtes|Effectuer les réservations, saisir la rooming list et la mise à jour des fichiers clients|Qualifications|Votre expérience et vos compétences incluent :|Qualité de service client essentielle|Informations supplémentaires|une expérience similaire est un plus|Maîtrise du logiciel Opera ou équivalent|Bonne communication et capacité à gérer les conflits|Maîtrise de l'Anglais, la pratique d'autres langues est un plus.|Votre équipe et votre environnement de travail :|En quelques mots, présentez l’équipe, l’établissement ou l’environnement de travail qui reflète la culture de l'équipe|Note : Vous pouvez inclure ici les spécificités locales ou les critères légaux, tels que le permis de travail.|Notre Engagement Diversité & Inclusion :|Nous sommes une entreprise inclusive et notre ambition est d’attirer, de recruter, et de promouvoir la diversité des talents.|
